name: The Messiah!
description:
Features:
*Multiplayer online Messiah RPG for Android.
*Free Updates with new bug fixes, enhancements, new miracles, items, and upgrades.
*Buy new items to perform miracles.
*Control buildings and generate Providence based on your location in the real world
*Upgrade your stats after gaining experience points to become a more powerful Messiah.
*Invite your friends via friend codes to grow your devotees.

If you're a fan of online role playing games, check out The Messiah!

NOTICE!
This game requires a Facebook account or mobile phone number for login. This is used so you can reconnect to your account if you change devices.

The Messiah is an online game only. The Messiah is a location-based game, in order to control minions in the game, your device must be able to use the built-in location sensor.
